data.title: Welcome to Real Enquiries
data.excerpt: **Streamline your property management with Real Enquiries!** 🚀 Now in production, our platform automates tenant screening, tenancy renewals, and compliance tasks—saving you time and effort.
data.author: Itamar Junior

content:
🚀 **We're live and building momentum!**  

Real Enquiries is now in the production phase, and we’re thrilled to announce that our waiting list is growing rapidly. If you’re a property manager, landlord, or real estate professional, this is your chance to streamline your workflows with cutting-edge automation.  

## **Why Real Enquiries?**  

Managing property inquiries, tenant screenings, and compliance can be overwhelming. **Real Enquiries** is designed to **automate** and **simplify** these processes, allowing you to focus on what really matters—your properties and tenants.  

## **What We Offer**  

- 🔍 **Automated Tenant Screening** – Instantly check RTB disputes, bankruptcy records, and online search results.  
- 📑 **Batch Tenancy Renewals** – Renew multiple tenancies in **one click**, ensuring compliance with RTB rules.  
- 📂 **Smart Document Processing** – Let AI analyze and validate submitted documents, reducing your manual workload.  
- 🛡 **GDPR-Compliant Data Retention** – Automatically handle data deletion or anonymization based on legal requirements.  
- 🔗 **Seamless Xero & Yardi Integration** – Sync tenant balances and tenancy data effortlessly.  
- 📦 **Real-Time RTB Pack Generation** – Generate legally compliant RTB registration packs with just a few clicks.  

## **Join the Waiting List**  

We’re rolling out **exclusive early access** for those on our waiting list! Don’t miss out on the opportunity to be among the first to experience Real Enquiries.  

📩 **Sign up today**: [Join the Waiting List]()  

Stay tuned for updates as we launch new features and integrations. The future of real estate management starts here! 🏡✨
